task: Hector used a tool called an auger to remove corn from a storage bin at a constant rate. The bin contained 38,400 bushels of corn when Hector began to use the auger. After 7 hours of using the auger, 23,040 bushels of corn remained in the bin. If the auger continues to remove corn at this rate, what is the total number of hours Hector will have been using the auger when 17,280 bushels of corn remain in the bin?
explanation:
Step 1: Calculate removal rate
Removed in first period: 38,400 - 23,040 = 15,360 bushels
Rate: 15,360 ÷ 7 = 2,194 bushels/hour
Step 2: Set up equation
Initial amount - (rate × time) = remaining
 $38,400 - 2,194x = 17,280$ 
Step 3: Solve for $x$ 
$38,400 - 17,280 = 2,194x$ 
21,120 ÷ 2,194 = 10 hours
